description: Badaboom is a blazingly fast media converter that makes it easy to format video files for a variety of devices, including the iPhone, iPad, Android phones and PSP, in a process called transcoding. In what used to take several hours, Badaboom converts feature-length movies to mobile profiles in a matter of minutes while still maintaining high video quality. By harnessing the power of NVIDIA CUDA-enabled GPUs, Badaboom offloads the CPU to allow users to continue browsing the Internet or checking email without decreased system performance, making transcoding high-quality video fast and easy. Badaboom is now hardware-accelerated with the latest NVIDIA GPUs. It is also functional in CPU-only mode for systems that don’t have an NVIDIA GPU.
summary: Optimized for NVIDIA CUDA, Elemental Technologies Badaboom Media Converter allows aspiring filmmakers to transcode video and movies quickly and efficiently.
author: Elemental Technologies Inc.
